articles.title: Odisha College Horror Victim's Friend Reveals Months Of Abuse, Harassment
articles.description: A 20-year-old student in Odisha set herself on fire, alleging sexual harassment by her college professor. Friends revealed she had confided about the abuse months before her death.

articles.title: Astronomer CEO's Wife Drops Surname After Affair Caught At Coldplay Concert
articles.description: Megan Kerrigan, wife of Astronomer CEO Andy Byron, removed her surname from her Facebook profile after a video surfaced showing her husband getting intimate with his company's Chief Public Officer at a Coldplay concert.

articles.title: 700 Bullets A Minute, 800 Metres Range: The Amethi-Made AK-203 Rifle
articles.description: A joint venture in Amethi, Uttar Pradesh, has begun indigenous production of the AK-203 rifle, named 'Sher' in India, capable of firing 700 bullets per minute with an 800-meter range.
